msContents.summary: The manuscript of drama Ratnāvalī ends at the beginning of the third act of the drama. On the blank folio at the end is written in English with pencil "112" "Ratnavali 2 ankas only", slightly right side is written "by Shriharsha". No diacritic marks are found in this note.

msItem.title: Ratnāvalī
msItem.author: Śrīharṣa

filiation.p: Aufrecht Catalogus1-492 New Catalogus Catalogorum vol. 23 pp 63-64

msItem.incipit: (1v 1) pādāgrasthitayā muhuḥ stanabhareṇānītayā namratāṃ śambhoḥ saspṛhalocanatrayapathaṃyāntyā (1v 2) tathārādhane ..
msItem.explicit: (18v 6) ṇavīṃ ṇādemo dhajamadaridariṃjati iti niṣkrānte praveśakaḥ tataḥ travisati madanāvasthānnāṭyan rājā rā niśvasya santāpo hṛdayasmaranalaṃkṛtaḥ

support.p: Thick wooden guard folio. Two lined square border is carved as a design on the front side of both the guard folio.

extent.measure: 2 guard folio, 18 written and 1 blank folio.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil letter numerals in the left margin. 1v-18v folios are numbered.

additions.desc: hariḥ oṃ śubhamastu is written in the left margin on 1v.
On the blank folio at the end is written in English with pencil "112" "Ratnavali 2 ankas only", slightly right side is written "by Shriharsha". No diacritic marks are found in this note.

binding.p: Red thread is used to tie the leaves.
